Package be.abeel.io

Class LineIterator

java.lang.Object
be.abeel.io.LineIterator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<String>, Iterator<String>
@Deprecated public class LineIterator extends Object implements Iterable<String>, Iterator<String>, Closeable
Deprecated.
A class to iterate over all lines in a file. The methods and constructors of this class will not throw an IO exception. Instead, they will throw a RuntimeException if something goes wrong. This class transparently reads GZIP files. The IOException can be retrieved from this RuntimeException with the method .getCause().
Author:
Thomas Abeel Deprecated 2016/10/07 -- will be removed 2017/04/07
